section.p: The Counting Report contains tables that enable you to roughly calculate the translator’s effort. You cannot change the tables to meet your requirements.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p: Select Counting Report from the Report field.
The following table shows which tabbed pages must be filled in to produce a Counting Report.

table.title: Overview of the tabbed pages to be filled in for a Counting Report

row.entry: To define the basics required for a report
To save or load the report layout defined on the Settings tabbed page
To set the factors for cost calculation
To create a report on specific shipments

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p: On the General page (see ), you can choose or specify the following options and parameters:

plentry.pd: This box contains the documents contained in the selected folder or the document that you selected from the Document List.

Choose one of the following Counting Report types: Base list To get a redundant segment list containing only the 99 most used segments with a frequency of 3 or above. Detailed list To get a redundant segment list containing all redundant segments.
To specify additional information on the report that will display in the header of the report. You can type up to 80 characters.
To display the report in a window.
To store the report in a specific file for which you can specify or select the name and directory and select the file format.

section.p: Click Create to start the creation of the Counting Report.

section.title: Results
section.p: The Counting Report is created according to your specifications.
